name: The Lion Eats Tonight
description:
Have you ever thought about the life and death struggle of being a lion on the distant continent of Africa? Have you ever wished you could ditch your average life and run on the dirt and bite with your teeth the skin of another living being (as an animal)?

You will wish no longer. Because there is now a powerfully intense animal simulation to fulfill that wish. The Lion Eats Tonight!

Features:

-> Intense and rapid-fire simulation of real-world lions hunting in action.

-> Features real voice acting talent and appearance of Davey Crustenborrow*.

*[deepfaked voice, not actual Davey Crustenborrow; not to be confused with legally distinct narrator entity Sir David Attenborough.]

-> Realistic and true educational informations about lions.

-> Advanced, hand-crafted and shaded pixel art graphics with real motion-captured animals.

-> Blast processing for optimized action (this game was made on a low end 2012 laptop with an Intel Pentium 4 so I promise it will run well on your computer).

-> Next generation, almost sentient AI (They move out of the way when you get close)
